title: Receive a Shipment with an ASN
description: A shipment arrives from a supplier who sent an Advance Ship Notice (ASN). The receiving process should be faster as the details are already in the system.

tasks.description: The operator scans the barcode on the BOL or pallet.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system finds the matching ASN from the supplier.

tasks.description: The system displays the expected contents of the shipment based on the ASN data.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator sees what they are supposed to receive.

tasks.description: The operator simply verifies the pallet count and confirms the receipt, without needing to count individual items.
tasks.expected_outcome: The receipt is processed quickly and efficiently.

tasks.description: The inventory is updated in the system based on the quantities in the ASN.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inventory is now available in the system.
